General.Name: B Yair Building Corporation 1988 Ltd
General.Description: B. Yair Building Corporation 1988 Ltd, a construction company, plans, develops, builds, and markets real estate projects in Israel and internationally. The company initiates and builds apartments, public buildings, and commercial and office structures, as well as undertakes urban renewal works. It also invests in commercial and office buildings, and shopping malls. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Jerusalem, Israel.

4.Name: Mr. Ilan  Biton
4.Title: VP - Acquisition & Logistics, VP - Yair B. (333) Construction Co. 2000 Ltd and Director
